title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus and the focus caret is not visible.
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo with the label 'Host:' when clicked.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo.
4. Observe that the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo.
